full_summary:
# Tender Announcement

## Solicitation Details

* **Title (English)**: Standardization of the drainage system and paving of the parking lot CCC Martineau
* **Title (French)**: Mise aux normes du système de drainage et pavage du stationnement CCC Martineau
* **Reference Number**: WS3568962530-Doc4009644982
* **Amendment Number**: 1
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3568962530
* **Publication Date**: May 16, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: June 20, 2023 at 14h00 EDT
* **Amendment Date**: June 13, 2023
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 17, 2022 (previously scheduled)
* **Expected Contract End Date**: September 24, 2024 (previously scheduled)

## Procurement Information

* **Category**: Infrastructure
* **Method**: Competitive Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Price (Lowest Price)

## Bid Requirements

All required supporting documentation and bids must be submitted electronically by 14h00 EDT on June 20, 2023. Late submissions will be deemed non-responsive.

## Total Identified Trade Agreements

* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

## Tender Description

A bid solicitation has been issued to supercede a previous bid solicitation (number EE519-200047/A dated March 10, 2023). A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted a bid on the previous solicitation. In this request for proposal, PWGSC invites suppliers to submit their bids for the standardization of the drainage system and paving of the parking lot at Martineau Community Correctional Centre (Montréal, QC) as detailed in the bid solicitation.

The cancellation of the initial bid caused by the modification of the expected start date from August 2022 to February 2024 is allowed according to regulations. Bids should respect the new submission deadline of June 20, 2023 at 14h00 EDT.

## Additional Information

* **DUNS**: n/a
* **Notice URL**: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16292490?extsite=MTYyOTI0OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16292490
